region.title: Region
region.description: Target region for TikTok Shop scraping. Default is BR (Brazil) for Brazilian market focus.

limit.title: Product Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of products to scrape

isTrendingProducts.title: Trending Products
isTrendingProducts.description: If true, scrapes trending products instead of search results

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Keyword to search for products (ignored if isTrendingProducts is true)

sortType.title: Sort Type
sortType.description: How to sort the search results

requireBrazilSignals.title: Require Brazil Signals
requireBrazilSignals.description: When active, filters results that don't appear to be from Brazil (currency BRL, warehouse in BR, etc.)

dropIfNoImage.title: Drop If No Image
dropIfNoImage.description: Discard items without valid image URLs
